etomica.util

Class Rational

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.util.Rational

  • public class Rational
extends java.lang.Object
    Class handling rational numbers (numerator / denominator), including addition, multiplication and reducing (15/6 => 5/2).

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      protected int numerator

      • Rational

        public Rational()

      • Rational

        public Rational(int numerator,
                int denominator)
        Creates Rational instance with the given numerator and denominator. If appropriate, the rational is simplified (factoring).

    • Method Detail

      • numerator

        public int numerator()
        Returns the numerator.

      • denominator

        public int denominator()
        Returns the denominator.

      • times

        public Rational times(Rational r)
        Returns a new Rational instance, which is the result of multiplying this Rational by the given Rational.

      • plus

        public Rational plus(Rational r)
        Returns a new Rational instance, which is the result of adding the given Rational to this Rational.

      • simplify

        protected void simplify()
        Simplify the rational. If the denominator is negative, the signs of the numerator and denominator are both flipped. Numerator and denominator are also divided by any common factors.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
